details: Used for primary tillage to turn over and break up soil, bury crop residues, and prepare the land for sowing.
Used for cutting and turning over the soil to prepare land for sowing, especially in hard and dry conditions.
Breaks up and smoothens soil after plowing, removes weeds, and improves seedbed conditions.
Uses rotating blades to break up and aerate soil, improving its texture for planting.
Used for secondary tillage to stir and pulverize soil, uproot weeds, and mix soil nutrients.
Levels the land surface for uniform irrigation and better crop establishment.
Sows seeds at a uniform depth and spacing, ensuring proper germination and crop growth.
Precision planting equipment that places seeds at exact depths and spacing.
Precision planting equipment that places potato at exact depths and spacing.
Scatters seeds over a large area quickly, used for crops that do not require precise planting.
Delivers water in the form of rainfall using pipes and rotating nozzles for uniform irrigation.
Delivers water directly to plant roots in a controlled manner, reducing water wastage.
Evenly distributes fertilizers across fields to ensure uniform crop nutrition.
Uses drones to spray fertilizers and pesticides with precision and efficiency.
Mounted on tractors to spray pesticides and fertilizers over large fields quickly.
Combines reaping, threshing, and winnowing into one operation to harvest grain crops.
A specialized machine designed to cut, process, and load sugarcane efficiently.
A machine used for harvesting potatoes by lifting them from the soil and separating them from dirt and plant residues.
A mechanized harvester designed to pick cotton from the plants without damaging the fibers.
Cuts crops efficiently, making harvesting easier and faster.
Separates grains from harvested crops, improving post-harvest efficiency.
Compresses harvested crops into compact bales for easy storage and transportation.
Separates grain from chaff by using wind or air flow.
Reduces moisture content in grains, preventing spoilage and improving storage life.
Processes grains into flour or other forms for consumption and storage.
Versatile machines used for plowing, tilling, harvesting, and transporting farm goods.
Used for transporting crops, equipment, and other agricultural materials.
Facilitates the movement of harvested crops and processed goods.
A manually operated climbing device that assists farmers in safely ascending coconut and areca nut trees for harvesting. It reduces physical effort compared to traditional climbing methods.
A battery-powered or motor-driven climbing device that enables farmers to climb trees effortlessly, improving safety and efficiency during harvesting.
